works.description:
Dear Google Support Team,

I am writing to you on behalf of Swerford Holdings Ltd. as a member of our  
legal department reagrding a violation of company's copyrights by a user of  
the Google App Engine.

Swerford Holdings Ltd. is a registered company in Gibraltar and operates  
the website www.pokerstrategy.com. The website is an online poker school  
where the users have the opportunity to learn how to play poker  
successfully. Therefore they get access to various strategy articles,  
videos and poker software produced by PokerStrategy.com. The access to the  
strategy content is divided in several levels from Basic level to Platinum.  
A user needs a certain amount of “Strategy Points” he can earn by using the  
services of PokerStrategy’s partner platforms to get access to the  
different levels. All services are offered in 18 languages and are offered  
free of charge. Furthermore, the users have the opportunity of being  
transferred to Real Money Poker Sites, if they want to play poker for real  
money. By using PokerStrategy's referrer links, they get a lot of  
incentives, like for example a free bonus of 50 US$ paid by  
PokerStrategy.com at some poker sites to the user's poker account so that  
the users start playing poker. PokerStrategy.com makes profit by getting a  
certain percentage of the revenue the users generate at the respective  
poker sites.

One of our employees from the Chinese Community Management noticed that the  
URL identified below is leading to a website, which copies the "look and  
feel" of PokerStrategy.com, including its logo, images and news articles.  
Whoever has copied the contents, this action is not authorized by Swerford  
Holdings Ltd.. For that reason we kindly ask you to remove the respective  
website from your server.

If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact me by email  
or by telephone.

We appreciate your coopertation in this matter.

Thank you very much in advance!

Yours sincerely,
Ingo Mak
Legal Assistant
Legal

ICANS GmbH
-Representing Swerford Holdings Ltd./PokerStrategy.com-
Valentinskamp 18
20354 Hamburg
Germany
AG Hamburg, HRB 100418
Directors: Tom Smets, David Altundag

Tel: +49 40 2263829-0
Fax: +49 40 3867 1592
Email: ingo.mak@pokerstrategy.com
Website: http://www.pokerstrategy.com
